channel.title: Help with making custom items!
channel.description:
Well I don't even know how to put my server online, but if someone would like to help me out, just PM me what I do with my no-ip.biz address.
So I'm using 127.0.0.1 to login onto my server (since I don't know how to put it online), but I started making customs, like light sabers, and weird godswords that are one handed, and dragon wings for capes. But I have a question...
[b]THE QUESTION:[/b] How do I get the .dat file of like an iron platebody or black platelegs or godswords and things like that?
I know for customs you use .dat files. Also on my server there are .dat files for vesta's and morrigan's because it is a 317 server and they are customs.
[b]ALSO THE QUESTION:[/b] So seriously guys, how do I get .dat files of weapons and armour so I can customize the 3D models...?

item.title: Help with making custom items!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Uncalled:

Custom items would be client sided.

Yes that’s correct. You can find a dat maker in the Models section, which this belongs in. Please post this

here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Get the dat maker here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

You can also look around the Models area for anymore help.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom items!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Custom items would be client sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making custom items!
item.dc:creator: @Flamo353 Flamo353
item.description:
@Flamo353 wrote:

Well I don’t even know how to put my server online, but if someone would like to help me out, just PM me what I do with my no-ip.biz address.

So I’m using 127.0.0.1 to login onto my server (since I don’t know how to put it online), but I started making customs, like light sabers, and weird godswords that are one handed, and dragon wings for capes. But I have a question…

THE QUESTION: How do I get the .dat file of like an iron platebody or black platelegs or godswords and things like that?

I know for customs you use .dat files. Also on my server there are .dat files for vesta’s and morrigan’s because it is a 317 server and they are customs.

ALSO THE QUESTION: So seriously guys, how do I get .dat files of weapons and armour so I can customize the 3D models…?
